statements: SELECT * FROM StockTurnoverRate WHERE quantity_sold > 100
SELECT product_id, selling_price FROM StockTurnoverRate WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT date, quantity_sold, cost_price FROM StockTurnoverRate ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM StockTurnoverRate WHERE cost_price > 50 ORDER BY selling_price ASC
SELECT AVG(selling_price) AS avg_selling_price, MAX(cost_price) AS max_cost_price FROM StockTurnoverRate
SELECT * FROM StockTurnoverRate WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, selling_price, cost_price FROM StockTurnoverRate WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY selling_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM StockTurnoverRate GROUP BY date HAVING total_quantity_sold > 500;
SELECT product_id, AVG(selling_price) AS avg_selling_price FROM StockTurnoverRate GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_selling_price DESC;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%M %Y') AS month_year, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM StockTurnoverRate GROUP BY month_year ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_date, stock_name, turnover_rate FROM stock_reports;
SELECT stock_name, turnover_rate, report_date FROM stock_reports;
SELECT * FROM stock_reports;
SELECT report_date, stock_name FROM stock_reports WHERE turnover_rate > 1.5;
SELECT report_date, stock_name, turnover_rate FROM stock_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT stock_name, turnover_rate FROM stock_reports WHERE report_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stock_reports WHERE stock_name='AAPL' AND turnover_rate > 2.5;
SELECT report_date, stock_name, turnover_rate FROM stock_reports ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT stock_name, AVG(turnover_rate) AS average_rate FROM stock_reports GROUP BY stock_name HAVING AVG(turnover_rate) > 3;

SELECT report_id, stock_name, change_type, change_value FROM stock_reports JOIN stock_changes ON stock_reports.stock_name = stock_changes.stock_name WHERE stock_reports.turnover_rate > 3 AND stock_changes.change_value < 0;
SELECT * FROM Stock ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT stock_name, purchase_date FROM Stock WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_quantity, purchase_price FROM Purchase ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT stock_name, stock_quantity, turnover_rate FROM Stock WHERE sale_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sale_id, sale_price, sale_quantity FROM Sale WHERE sale_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Stock ORDER BY stock_id DESC, stock_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT stock_name, stock_quantity, turnover_rate FROM Stock WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC
SELECT stock_name, purchase_quantity, purchase_price FROM Stock JOIN Purchase ON Stock.stock_id = Purchase.stock_id WHERE Purchase.purchase_quantity > 100 ORDER BY purchase_quantity DESC
SELECT stock_name, purchase_date, sale_date FROM Stock WHERE stock_quantity < 50 AND purchase_date > '2022-01-01' AND sale_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT stock_name, purchase_price, sale_price, sale_quantity FROM Stock JOIN Sale ON Stock.stock_id = Sale.stock_id ORDER BY sale_quantity*sale_price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM StockReports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM StockReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_category FROM StockItems ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM StockHistory GROUP BY item_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date, turnover_rate FROM StockReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, item_category, stock_quantity FROM StockItems WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT si.item_name, sh.history_date, sh.history_notes FROM StockItems si JOIN StockHistory sh ON si.item_id = sh.item_id WHERE sh.history_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT st.transaction_id, si.item_name, sh.history_date, sr.report_name FROM StockTransactions st JOIN StockItems si ON st.item_id = si.item_id JOIN StockHistory sh ON st.transaction_id = sh.transaction_id JOIN StockReports sr ON st.transaction_date = sr.report_date;
SELECT product_name, price FROM stock
SELECT * FROM turnover ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM stock WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, brand FROM product JOIN stock ON product.product_id = stock.id
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_type FROM analysis
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM stock WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, purchase_date, sold_date FROM stock WHERE quantity < 10 AND price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, brand FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT report_name, description FROM report WHERE generated_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
